name: The Vidiots
description:
Humans have turned into Vidiots; green globs who lust for nothing more than TV, and you're a TV Head; a new form of life with a TV for a head.

Now use these Vidiots to solve puzzle(s) and ascend to the top of the building. 

Oh, there's also a little ability to go between the real world and the TV world. Have fun!

Created for A Game By Its Cover 2019 Game Jam

Thanks to Jordan Persson for the cartridge cover that we used.

-------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

ACTION : BUTTON

Movement: W, A, S, D

Switch Worlds: Space bar

Interact: E

[WHEN UNLOCKED]

Take Out VHS: 1

Insert VHS: 2

Order Vidiots: Left Click

Call Back Vidiots: Q
